00021 
00022 #include "superlu_defs.h"
00023 
00024 /*-- Auxiliary data type used in PxGSTRS/PxGSTRS1. */
00025 typedef struct {
00026     int_t lbnum;  /* Row block number (local).      */
00027     int_t indpos; /* Starting position in Uindex[]. */
00028 } Ucb_indptr_t;
00029 
00030 /* 
00031  * On each processor, the blocks in L are stored in compressed block
00032  * column format, the blocks in U are stored in compressed block row format.
00033  */
00034 #define MAX_LOOKAHEADS 50
00035 typedef struct {
00036     int_t   **Lrowind_bc_ptr; /* size ceil(NSUPERS/Pc)                 */
00037     double  **Lnzval_bc_ptr;  /* size ceil(NSUPERS/Pc)                 */
00038     int_t   **Ufstnz_br_ptr;  /* size ceil(NSUPERS/Pr)                 */
00039     double  **Unzval_br_ptr;  /* size ceil(NSUPERS/Pr)                 */
00040 #if 0
00041     int_t   *Lsub_buf;        /* Buffer for the remote subscripts of L */
00042     double  *Lval_buf;        /* Buffer for the remote nonzeros of L   */
00043 #endif
00044     int_t   *Lsub_buf_2[MAX_LOOKAHEADS];   /* Buffers for the remote subscripts of L*/
00045     double  *Lval_buf_2[MAX_LOOKAHEADS];   /* Buffers for the remote nonzeros of L  */
00046     int_t   *Usub_buf_2[MAX_LOOKAHEADS];   /* Buffer for the remote subscripts of U */
00047     double  *Uval_buf_2[MAX_LOOKAHEADS];   /* Buffer for the remote nonzeros of U   */
00048     int_t   *Usub_buf;        /* Buffer for the remote subscripts of U */
00049     double  *Uval_buf;        /* Buffer for the remote nonzeros of U   */
00050     double  *ujrow;           /* used in panel factorization.          */
00051     int_t   bufmax[NBUFFERS]; /* Buffer size; 5 entries
00052                                *     0 : size of Lsub_buf[]
00053                                *     1 : size of Lval_buf[]
00054                                *     2 : size of Usub_buf[] 
00055                                *     3 : size of Uval_buf[]
00056                                *     4 : size of tempv[LDA]
00057                                */
00058 
00059     /*-- Record communication schedule for factorization. --*/
00060     int_t   *ToRecv;          /* Recv from no one (0), left (1), and up (2).*/
00061     int_t   *ToSendD;         /* Whether need to send down block row.       */
00062     int_t   **ToSendR;        /* List of processes to send right block col. */
00063 
00064     /*-- Record communication schedule for forward/back solves. --*/
00065     int_t   *fmod;            /* Modification count for L-solve            */
00066     int_t   **fsendx_plist;   /* Column process list to send down Xk       */
00067     int_t   *frecv;           /* Modifications to be recv'd in proc row    */
00068     int_t   nfrecvx;          /* Number of Xk I will receive in L-solve    */
00069     int_t   nfsendx;          /* Number of Xk I will send in L-solve       */
00070     int_t   *bmod;            /* Modification count for U-solve            */
00071     int_t   **bsendx_plist;   /* Column process list to send down Xk       */
00072     int_t   *brecv;           /* Modifications to be recv'd in proc row    */
00073     int_t   nbrecvx;          /* Number of Xk I will receive in U-solve    */
00074     int_t   nbsendx;          /* Number of Xk I will send in U-solve       */
00075     int_t   *mod_bit;         /* Flag contribution from each row blocks    */
00076 
00077     /*-- Auxiliary arrays used for forward/back solves. --*/
00078     int_t   *ilsum;           /* Starting position of each supernode in lsum
00079                                  (local)  */
00080     int_t   ldalsum;          /* LDA of lsum (local) */
00081     int_t   SolveMsgSent;     /* Number of actual messages sent in LU-solve */
00082     int_t   SolveMsgVol;      /* Volume of messages sent in the solve phase */
00083 
00084 
00085     /*********************/     
00086     /* The following variables are used in the hybrid solver */
00087 
00088     /*-- Counts to be used in U^{-T} triangular solve. -- */
00089     int_t UT_SOLVE;
00090     int_t L_SOLVE;
00091     int_t FRECV;
00092     int_t ut_ldalsum;        /* LDA of lsum (local) */
00093     int_t *ut_ilsum;         /* ilsum in column-wise                        */
00094     int_t *utmod;            /* Modification count for Ut-solve.            */
00095     int_t **ut_sendx_plist;  /* Row process list to send down Xk            */
00096     int_t *utrecv;           /* Modifications to be recev'd in proc column. */
00097     int_t n_utsendx;         /* Number of Xk I will receive                 */
00098     int_t n_utrecvx;         /* Number of Xk I will send                    */
00099     int_t n_utrecvmod;
00100     int_t nroot;
00101     int_t *ut_modbit;
00102     int_t *Urbs;
00103     Ucb_indptr_t **Ucb_indptr;/* Vertical linked list pointing to Uindex[] */
00104     int_t  **Ucb_valptr;      /* Vertical linked list pointing to Unzval[] */
00105 
00106     /* some additional counters for L solve */
00107     int_t n;
00108     int_t nleaf;
00109     int_t nfrecvmod;
00110 } LocalLU_t;

00113 typedef struct {
00114     int_t *etree;
00115     Glu_persist_t *Glu_persist;
00116     LocalLU_t *Llu;
00117 } LUstruct_t;

00120 /*-- Data structure for communication during matrix-vector multiplication. */
00121 typedef struct {
00122     int_t *extern_start;
00123     int_t *ind_tosend;    /* X indeices to be sent to other processes */
00124     int_t *ind_torecv;    /* X indeices to be received from other processes */
00125     int_t *ptr_ind_tosend;/* Printers to ind_tosend[] (Size procs)
00126                              (also point to val_torecv) */
00127     int_t *ptr_ind_torecv;/* Printers to ind_torecv[] (Size procs)
00128                              (also point to val_tosend) */
00129     int   *SendCounts;    /* Numbers of X indices to be sent
00130                              (also numbers of X values to be received) */
00131     int   *RecvCounts;    /* Numbers of X indices to be received
00132                              (also numbers of X values to be sent) */
00133     double *val_tosend;   /* X values to be sent to other processes */
00134     double *val_torecv;   /* X values to be received from other processes */
00135     int_t TotalIndSend;   /* Total number of indices to be sent
00136                              (also total number of values to be received) */
00137     int_t TotalValSend;   /* Total number of values to be sent.
00138                              (also total number of indices to be received) */
00139 } pdgsmv_comm_t;
00140 
00141 /*-- Data structure for redistribution of B and X --*/
00142 typedef struct {
00143     int  *B_to_X_SendCnt;
00144     int  *X_to_B_SendCnt;
00145     int  *ptr_to_ibuf, *ptr_to_dbuf;
00146 
00147     /* the following are needed in the hybrid solver */ 
00148     int *X_to_B_iSendCnt;
00149     int *X_to_B_vSendCnt;
00150     int    *disp_ibuf;
00151     int_t  *send_ibuf;
00152     void   *send_dbuf;
00153 
00154     int_t  x2b, b2x;
00155     int_t  *send_ibuf2;
00156     int_t  *recv_ibuf2;
00157     void   *send_dbuf2;
00158     void   *recv_dbuf2;
00159 } pxgstrs_comm_t;
00160 
00161 /*-- Data structure holding the information for the solution phase --*/
00162 typedef struct {
00163     int_t *row_to_proc;
00164     int_t *inv_perm_c;
00165     int_t num_diag_procs, *diag_procs, *diag_len;
00166     pdgsmv_comm_t *gsmv_comm;
00167     pxgstrs_comm_t *gstrs_comm;
00168     int_t *A_colind_gsmv; /* After pdgsmv_init(), the global column
00169                              indices of A are translated into the relative
00170                              positions in the gathered x-vector.
00171                              This is re-used in repeated calls to pdgsmv() */
00172     int_t *xrow_to_proc;
00173 } SOLVEstruct_t;
